getTroveCollAndDebt(address).details: Also includes pending rewards from redistribution

getTroveCollSharesAndDebt(address).details: Also includes pending rewards from redistribution

params._paused: If true the protocol is paused

startSunset().details: IMPORTANT: When sunsetting a collateral altogether this function should be called on all TM linked to that collateral as well as `StabilityPool.startCollateralSunset`

claimCollateral(address).notice: Claim remaining collateral from a redemption or from a liquidation with ICR > MCR in Recovery Mode

getEntireDebtAndCollShares(address).notice: Get the total and pending collateral and debt amounts for a trove

getTroveCollAndDebt(address).notice: Get the current total collateral and debt amounts for a trove

getTroveCollSharesAndDebt(address).notice: Get the current total collateral and debt amounts for a trove

setBorrowingFeeEnabled(bool).notice: Sets the switch for borrowing fee for this trove manager

setCollGasCompPercentage(uint256).notice: Sets the collateral gas compensation % for this trove manager

setPaused(bool).notice: Sets the pause state for this trove manager         Pausing is used to mitigate risks in exceptional circumstances         Functionalities affected by pausing are:         - New borrowing is not possible         - New collateral deposits are not possible

setPriceFeed(address).notice: Sets a custom price feed for this trove manager

startSunset().notice: Starts sunsetting a collateral         During sunsetting only the following are possible: 1) Disable collateral handoff to SP 2) Greatly Increase interest rate to incentivize redemptions 3) Remove redemptions fees 4) Disable new loans
